changelog:
**Added:**
- Upload custom audio files from your computer
- Favourite recordings via hotkey (default #)
- Switch profiles via hotkey (default ')
- Reverse clips while applying pitch up or pitch down using a 3-key hotkey combo
- "Remove Segment" button in the trim editor to cut out a selected section and seamlessly join remaining audio
- Per-clip volume adjustment in the trim editor

**Fixed:**
- Favourite recordings not counting toward disk usage or total recording count
- Restored favourites requiring an engine restart before playback
